author: W. B.
notes: Broadside portrait of Sir Thomas Overbury, showing him writing his own epitaph, with verse at bottom of sheet signed: W.B. The portrait signed at lower edge: Renold Elstrack sculpsit, Compton Holland excudit.
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
